11111.content:
Sasuke stared at the happily eating blond before him, his mind wandering.

Sasuke couldn't pinpoint the moment when he wanted the blond teen to chub up. It might have been when he lost the puppy fat around his face, maybe when his muscles became more defined. If Sasuke had to guess though, it would be last week when he watched the blonde gorge himself, the massively stuffed boy's stomach protruding outwards, rising his jacket up towards his chest.

'That', the raven-haired teen thought, 'that gut I want to be a permanent fixture... Just softer.'

Which is why the two of them were currently found at the barbeque, the blonde happily stuffing his face while Sasuke filled up the blonde's grill with more and more meat.

If Sasuke wanted to make Naruto's gut a permanent part of the blonde, then he would need to try and keep the blonde as stuffed as possible for as long as possible each day. He didn't expect Naruto's filled-to-the-brim stomach to stop the blond from exercising. Maybe though, maybe the massive influx of food would override Naruto's quite tough training, so hopefully it would soften the blonde up, bit by bit, pound by pound.

He had far to much money anyway, so he had nothing against throwing a ton of money at food for the younger boy.

A burp left Naruto as he finished his current serving, his hand resting on his bloated stomach, a blissful expression on his whiskered face.

"You full?" Sasuke asked, sending a teasing smirk at the resting teen.

Feeling his stomach, he sent a smirk back at the raven, smacking the barely covered gut. "Ya kidding? I can stuff myself way past this."

Sasuke had to hide his happy smile at that as he went towards the counter for more food, and in his minds eye, a slowly fattening Naruto growing bigger and bigger.

111112.content:
A week later we find the duo back at the barbeque restaurant, Sasuke enjoying what has become a quite common view for him as he stared at the blonde who stuffed his face enthusiastically.

It had been surprisingly easy to keep the teen constantly filled to the brim, Sasuke having underestimated just how much Naruto liked to stuff his face. Not that Sasuke was complaining, enjoying the round globe he could watch wobble around every day. Ending each day with a trip to Ichiraku was a stroke of genius Sasuke found out, the blonde going into overdrive when he had basically unlimited amounts of his favorite ramen to gorge on.

He had tried to pay for at least some of the food Sasuke was showering him in, but the Uchiha quickly managed to convince the whiskered boy that he had absolutely no problem with paying for any food the blonde ate, saying he could probably pay for the village's food bill for an entire year before he had to stop. Naruto's lone gluttony was basically nothing.

He had decided to take Naruto to the bath house the previous day before breakfast. He didn't expect to see any difference in the teen quite yet, and he seemed to be correct in his assumptions... That is, until the blonde sat down, and his stomach bunched up slightly, showing a layer of flesh that he had completely overlooked. He could barely keep himself from staring at it, though he couldn't help but glancing at it. Thankfully, Naruto seemed to have completely missed the repeated looks sent towards his slowly softening midriff.

He had to stop himself from drooling at the end of yesterday's ramen gorge, the blonde so stuffed he was delirious, and the button on his pants oh so close to bursting.

"Ahh, that hit the spot." Naruto moaned as he caressed his bloated stomach, the stuffed gut pressing harshly against the T-shirt he was wearing, though not making it rise up just yet. That, Sasuke knew, would slowly change as the day progressed. He couldn't wait for the day Naruto's T-shirt was constantly stressed due to fat, love-handles, chest-fat, back-fat and gut basically making him burst out of it, though a food-filled gut would tide him over for now.

"That seems to have filled you up good." And it was true, the plates was stacked pretty high, a bunch of different meat having disappeared into the gaping maw of the blonde.

"Hmm," The blonde hummed as he massaged his stomach, reaching underneath his T-shirt to do so. "I guess I can have another round or two." He mumbled in contentment, breaking Sasuke's mesmerized stare at the tanned stomach. "Maybe we can take a trip to your house afterwards, letting this digest." He ended, smacking the stuffed mass.

"Sure, why not."

That was something that had surprised him about Naruto in his full state. They had, basically after every meal, taken a break somewhere for Naruto to rest, the thought about training seemingly having left the blonde's mind as his hunger was constantly satisfied. Of course, even when Naruto rested, Sasuke still had a snack or two close by, the younger teen happily munching it down despite his tight-fitted stomach.

The raven put the meat on the grill, listening to Naruto talk as he day-dreamed about a bigger Naruto.

If only he could speed it up...

11111212.content:
Week one

A loud burp resounded throughout the Ichiraku ramen stand, followed with the booming laughter of the ramen chef as the originator of the burp was far too full to even think about blushing at the far too loud sound.

“Now that's the sound of a satisfied customer!” Teuchi chortled as he moved the large stack of bowls, leaving the massively bloated blonde alone with the staring Uchiha.

Sasuke couldn't stop himself from staring at Naruto, the boy's stomach so large, and the waist of the pants so tight that his eyes were constantly drawn towards the tanned mass of flesh that was slowly pushing in and out as the blonde took long-but-small breaths as he cradled his overfilled gut, the teen's eyes closed in a combination of bliss and pain.

Despite the heat in his stomach roaring throughout his body, he still noticed the small flashes of pain that coursed through Naruto's face. Flicking his eyes downwards, he noticed the culprit: The heroic button that was doing its best to keep the pants in one piece.

Pushing in Naruto's stomach a bit (Earning a disgruntled groan from the blonde) he quickly un-buttoned the orange pants, Naruto's gut falling forward a bit more than before, sending another rush of heat through Sasuke's body. Looking back at the whiskered teen's face, he couldn't help but smile a bit as the slightly pained look was exchanged with an euphoric expression, a relieved sigh leaving the blonde.

Not being able to help himself, he softly let his hand rub across the smooth surface, a happy moan leaving the delirious blonde at the motion. So firm, yet with the slightest softness to it, earning a happy sparkle in the Uchiha's black eyes as Naruto's new diet seemed to have started doing its job.

Enjoying the feeling of the bloated smooth skin underneath his palm for a few more minutes, he finally pulled his hand back, another groan leaving the blonde at that, though Sasuke couldn't really tell if it was a happy or sad groan.

“Alright Naruto, time to get you home.” Sasuke sighed as he stood up from his seat. After throwing a small bundle of money on the table before them, he put his arm under the blonde's shoulders, and after a bit of struggle they managed to get Naruto standing. (Understandable really, with that massive gut the blonde was sporting)

As they half-waddled back to Naruto's apartment, Sasuke couldn't help but have his hand run along the blonde's side, enjoying the new softness there that was lacking before.

Week two

“Man, I can't believe Kiba gave up that quickly. I ate like five more plates than him!” Naruto bragged as he laid on the grass, grinning and rubbing his stomach in satisfaction at his victory.

“Maybe he's not as big of a glutton as you are.” Sasuke teased back, quite enjoying the view of the blonde massaging his stomach, the mass of flesh becoming more malleable and a more permanent feature for each day. The chuckle leaving the blonde made the gut wobble, enrapturing the raven even more.

“Heh, yeah maybe.” A satisfied sigh left the blonde as he put both hands behind his head, his T-shirt riding higher on his torso.

He had never seen Naruto and Kiba duke it out over a food filled table before, but he had heard the stories. He had thought the two of them would be evenly matched, so it was with some surprise when Naruto plowed right over Kiba, the dog-nin staring at the blonde in shock as the teen continued on after Kiba threw in the towel.

Sasuke watched Kiba glance at the beginning love-handles the blonde had, the new flesh having started to make his usual black T-shirts pretty snug on the blonde even when his stomach was empty, and Sasuke wondered how the dog-loving teen would react.

Too Sasuke happiness, he watched the brown-haired teen's eyes harden in determination, the boy sizing up Naruto properly, apparently getting ready for some gut-busting training to catch up with the blonde.

Sasuke watched the blonde nap, and he couldn't help but feel satisfied. Hopefully, with Kiba and Naruto's competetive nature, the dog-nin would unknowingly help Sasuke in chubbing up the blonde.

He couldn't wait.

Week three

The duo froze where they sat at the sound of something snapping, rapidly being followed by something small hitting the floor.

The red face the blonde sported, and the expansion of his bloated gut told Sasuke everything he needed to know, and he could feel himself tremble faintly on the spot at the mere fact that Naruto had just busted his pants.

Naruto himself was edging between being embarassed due to basically outgrowing his pants like that in public, and some sort of pride at being able to munch down on enough food to bust the pants in the first place. The thought that his clothes was already pretty tight before he started his breakfast was niggling at the back of his mind, but it was quickly pushed aside at his current predicament.

Not even during his most intense glutting had he ever done anything like this.

Glancing at Sasuke, his embarassment basically died at the look Sasuke sent his midriff. He had almost never seen the raven so excited before, and the fact that it was himself that made the Uchiha like this basically made the blonde swell in glee.

He smacked his stomach with a grin, ignoring the jiggling most of his torso did at the hit. “Heh, guess this tanks starting to get a life of it's own, ehh?”

Blinking out of his stupor, Sasuke shook his head to clear his mind before meeting the blonde's eyes, a pretty happy smirk on his face.

“Yeah, seems like it... I'm not really complaining though.” His eyes raked over the other teen's body, taking in the almost skin-tight T-shirt. It could barely cover the teen when they meet that day, and now it had risen up, exposing a good amount of his torso. The blonde's love-handles basically grabbable, and his chest having softened from its usual hardness just made things even better. Even the pants were still pretty tight, due to the teens thickening hips, legs and butt.

Even his face had softened, loosing some of the sharpness to it, and a double-chin forming whenever the blonde looked downwards. There were even a hint of it even when the blonde was staring straight ahead, something which Sasuke found himself more and more enamored by.

All in all, Naruto was looking pretty good to Sasuke's eyes... He could still be bigger though. He hadn't busted out of any off his shirts after all.

He pushed the plate filled with different kind of sushi towards his weighty friend, his smirk widening at the hungry look he sent the food.

“You're not done yet, are you?”

The blonde picking up the chopsticks and resuming his stuffing told Sasuke everything he needed.

Week four

A creak left the bed as Naruto sat down with a sigh, his hands moving to his exposed stomach, rubbing the hefty gut in a soothing manner. His T-shirt was unbearably tight after everything he'd stuffed himself with.

Today had been a good day, the growing teen decided. Breakfast at Sasuke's place, where he was served pancakes until he almost got sick which was followed by a nap on the raven's couch, the teen having been gracious enough to lend it to the blonde.

At lunch he and Sasuke had met up with Kiba at the barbeque place, where they got into another one of their eating competitions, which led to another victory to the blonde. The dog-nin seemed to have worked hard on his eating though, the blonde noticed, as he managed to keep up with Naruto for longer than expected. Naruto could even spot, after their great meal, the start of love-handles on the tattoed boy, his waist having been exposed due to his great gut.

The two gorged teens were basically stuck where they sat though, their overfilled stomachs basically keeping them in place, so they had talked for a while, catching up on the going-ons... Well, it had mostly been the two of them teasingly ribbing each other while Sasuke brought them a large amount of ice-cream, the frozen treats more than enough to keep the two of them filled up, though not enough to keep them stuffed for the rest of the day.

Which is why Naruto's gut, while still feeling pretty filled and full, groaned in hunger that night, which is the signal that the competetive teens needed to split up for the day, Kiba trudging towards his home while Sasuke and an almost waddling Naruto found themselves at the ramen stand.

Naruto was glad that he had chosen a stretchy pair of pants that day, as he had no doubt that any of his buttoned pants would have burst even before the ramen gorge. Heck, he had even had problems getting them on at all lately, which is really the reason as to why he had gone for stretchy pants.

Not that these pants were much better, at least around his tights the blonde mused, feeling how they stretched around his legs. A part of him had actually been a bit worried they would split when he waddled home, Sasuke supporting him a bit as his gut was probably the biggest it had ever been, due to all the eating he had done that day... Not that it lessened any with the bag of buns the raven had bought, the blonde somehow managing to find room to munch them down before getting home.

'Guess it's time to hit the bed.' He mused to himself before stretching. At it's peak, a rip was heard, and he could feel one of his sides hit the air more than before. Lowering his arms, he heard his T-shirt rip some more, and a blush stained his cheeks.

Did he just...?

Yanking off the tight material, he stared at the rip in disbelief. He broke his shirt. Staring at the hefty gut, somewhat chunky chest and pretty big love-handles told him everything he needed to know really. Not that his legs were any better, pushing as harshly as they did against his pants.

He sat there for a moment, thinking, before a yawn left him.

He'd worry about this tomorrow.

111112121.content:
The next morning, our chunky hero found himself just the tiniest bit annoyed.

None of his shirts fit, like, at all!

Really, it was his own fault for not noticing earlier, but still!

No matter how much he pulled or tugged, and no matter how much he tried to stretch them out, none of them managed to properly cover his belly! The lower part of the soft mass jiggling free from the constraining material, having started to obscure his feet somewhat, and part of his lovehandles were also seeing the light of day.

He had to stop himself from giggling though, as he kinda looked like someone had stuffed a soccer ball down his throat. A small part of him had to admire that he managed to eat himself way bigger yesterday to bust that shirt.

His pants were thankfully not as bad, if only due to the stretchy waist. Despite how large his butt had grown, and how snug the seat of his pants felt across his expanded waistline, it still had enough stretch in it that Naruto could with confidence say that they wouldn't rip... At least not yet. His legs were another matter entirely, though he had nothing else to wear, so he had to accept that he looked a bit like an overstuffed sausage.

It was with a huff that Naruto opened his door that morning, Sasuke standing there mid knock, the raven raising an eye-brow at the irated chunkster before him.

“What's up with you this morning?” He couldn't help but ask, though the tight attire that the blonde wore told him everything he needed to know. (The soft, round, uncovered mid-riff and the tight pants stretched across his growing booty sending an appreciative shiver down his spine)

“This is my problem.” He smacked his gut, the reserved teen's cool fraying slightly at the small tremors sent throughout the fat teen's torso, every single jiggle visible due to his tight clothes.

Managing to collect himself, he gave the blonde his best deadpan stare, sending as much apathy as possible towards Naruto.

“You mean the weight? Really, why does that matter?”

“Because... Because it does! And none my clothes fit me right anymore, I mean, look at this!” Grabbing his protruding belly, he gave it a shake, Sasuke twitching as the malleable mass swayed slightly.

“Mhmm.” Rolling his eyes, his deadpan stare increased in strength. “Be honest with me, is it the fat, or the clothes that is the actual problem here?”

“Well...” The chunky ninja hesistated for a moment, contemplation appearing on his face. “It IS mostly the clothes, I'm not exactly made of money, and getting a whole new wardrobe ain't exactly cheap.”

“And I am completely willing to help with that.” Here, the Uchiha draped one of his arms around the slightly shorter boy's shoulders, leading him through the village in search of a clothing shop the raven found fitting, while at the same time enjoying the softness the blonde sported. “And really, when has being fat ever actually slowed a ninja down any? There's a bunch of pretty huge ninja's out there that is strong AND fast. I mean, while I will say that I am a lot faster than Chouji, he could outrun most of the newbie jounins in the village.”

“I guess you're right.” Our fat hero agreed, knowing that with Chakra, even the fattest of people could do everything a skinny ninja could... With certain mobility limits of course.

“Wait, hold on!” He stopped abruptly, forcing Sasuke to stop with him. “What do you mean you'll 'Help me with my clothes'?”

The sharingan wielder stared at his fat friend, an eyebrow raised. “It's exactly what it sounds like. I'll help you find new clothes, and I'll pay for them.”

Naruto gaped at the other teen, warring between indignity and happiness.

“But you're already paying for the food!”

“So? I like paying for your stuff.”

“B-But-”

“No buts.” Here the raven threw his arm around the blondes' shoulders again, dragging the boy along. “Unless it's this butt, then it's okay.” He patted the chunky bottom, earning an eye-roll and a small smack from Naruto, though the smile he was wearing was unmistakable.

“Fine, but ya gotta let me do something for you soon.”

“Don't worry.” Sasuke squeezed the padded shoulder. “I'll tell you if I need something.”

1111121211.content:
“Right then.” The quieter of the two began. “What do you want?”

Naruto looked around at the large selection of T-shirts, jackets, pants, socks and undergarments before him, ignoring the way people were staring at his exposed midriff, and the way Sasuke was shoving away any employees that were approaching the duo. Obviously, his eyes drifted towards his standard orange clothes.

“Why did I even ask.” The raven asked, earning a shrug and a smirk from the blonde.

“Hey, orange is great, okay.” At that he trudged over to the jacket-pants combo, Sasuke following along, enjoying the rear-view he was getting while also taking note of where the blonde's customary black T-shirts were located.

Watching the blonde contemplate the sizes, he couldn't help but let out another sigh. “You've got no idea how big you are, do you?” Naruto's sheepish grin told him everything he needed.

“Right then.” Grabbing the excitable boy, while also borrowing a measuring tape from a passing employee, he dragged the stumbling teen towards the changing rooms, pushing him in before entering himself.

“Shirt and pants off.” He ordered, already unfurling the tape, Naruto staring at him for a moment before shrugging. Sasuke couldn't help but suck in a silent breath as he stared at the undressing blonde, for the first time getting a proper look at the round gut the other teen was sporting.

Seeing how he was struggling with his pants, he smacked away the rotund blonde's fumbling hands before getting a decent grip on the tight material, and with a couple of hard tugs he got them down the chubby boy's legs, Naruto kicking them off afterwards.

Stepping almost flush to the shorter teen, he draped the tape around the waist, dragging his hands over the fleshy sides, the fat giving away to his touch.

'So soft.' He mused, rubbing the almost pillow-like flesh. Taking a hold of them he gave them a jiggle, sending a ripple through the torso, almost as if the teen was filled with jello, earning a snort from the blonde that had directed his face towards the ceiling.

“Seriously, Sasuke?” The teen giggled, raising his arms behind his head to give Sasuke a better look.

“What, it's interesting.” He could admit that much to the blonde at least. Giving them another rub and squeeze, he finally dragged his hands to the front of the tanned teen. “Maybe I should use you as my personal buddah.” Another giggle left the almost naked teen, Sasuke giving the gut a rub in demonstration. Pushing in on it, he was surprised that while it was soft, it had a surprising firmness to it.

Giving it a pat, he finally got back to work. He fully encircled the teen with the tape, and as he took a look at the number, he had to admit that he expected it to be a bit higher.

“Well?” Our chubby hero asked, feeling the tape being removed.

“Obviously you need larger shirts.” He muttered, his fingers poking the soft flesh on the teen's chest. His fingers didn't go that deep. Really, it was simply that his pecks had disappeared under a layer of flesh. Not enough to really call them man boobs yet, though undoubtedly infinitely softer than his previously hard pecs.

“You really like feeling me up, don't you.” It wasn't really a question, a teasing smirk sent towards the raven.

“I probably wouldn't do this with anyone else. I trust you enough to know I won't freak you out.” With that, he measured the chest, ignoring the blinding smile the blonde sent him at his admittance. Hey, he could be nice if he wanted to!

“Turn around.” He muttered, tapping the teen's fleshy side.

Getting down on his knees, he encircled the teens hips, his eyes constantly dipping down to the ill-fitting underwear, roving over the expanded butt Naruto had attained. Really, it wasn't all that big, though it was definitely much softer and more shapely than the flat bottom Naruto had before. Not being able to hold himself, he took a hold of one of the cheeks and squeezed, sending Naruto into another giggle-fit, the blonde kicking Sasuke's leg a bit, though not really stopping him.

“You've grown bigger everywhere, haven't you.” He finally managed to utter, glancing at the number before going down to the legs, feeling a bit disappointed that they weren't chunkier... Nothing that couldn't be fixed with some time and a lot of food.

“What can I say, all that food had to go somewhere, ya know.” He shook his butt a bit, the Uchiha's eyes basically glued on the blonde's ass. He turned around as Sasuke removed the tape from his leg, sending the taller boy a look that said 'what now?'

“Obviously you need a few sizes bigger in everything, and we should probably pick up clothes a few sizes bigger than that if we're going to continue feeding you as much as we have.”

“Well...” Rubbing his stomach, a hungry growl left the mass of flesh, a sheepish grin breaking out across his face. “Okay, I gotta admit that I have really enjoyed our time together. That, coupled with all the food and the occasional get-together with Kiba has kinda made these last few weeks really great. And hey,” He smacked his stomach, his grin growing more confident. “If me getting fatter is the side-effect of our time together, then that's a-okay with me!”

“We should definitely get you some sizes bigger than what you need now. Wait here.”

It didn't take long for the Uchiha to throw over bigger clothes for the blonde, and he had to admit that it felt great to finally wear something that fit properly again. As he got dressed again, he could hear the fire user lug a bunch of stuff over to the clerk.

Leaving the dressing room, he barely managed to catch the scroll that was thrown at him.

“In there you got several sets of your orange suit, along with T-shirt in the size you're currently wearing, and in this-” Sasuke handed Naruto another scroll. “You got a few more sets at a larger size, just in case.” Here he patted the blonde's covered gut, smirking all the time.

“Heh, thanks for all this, ya rich jerk. Now, I really need to get some grub in my belly!” Sasuke barely repressed a chuckle at the dreamy looks the blonde sported, the chubby boy barely managing to keep from drooling. A lightbulb went on inside Sasuke's head.

“Hey, I saw Kiba walk to the steak-house. Want to join up with him?”

A groan was heard from the bed of a certain demon-container, the sun hitting him in the face, forcing his mind into conciousness. Cracking an eye open, he glared towards the offending sphere of light before throwing an arm over his eyes, deciding to bask in the post-sleep drowsiness for another minute before having to face the day.

Not that this day would be any more difficult than any other day he had gone through recently.The blonde had to admit, the last few weeks had been pretty dang amazing and fulfilling. (In more ways than one)

Hanging out so much with Sasuke was an added bonus to it all, and Naruto had to admit he was pretty happy that their relationship seemed to have grown to an all-new high this last month. Not that it was bad before, it was really only at the start of their genin days that they barely could tolerate the sight of each other.

And then it was all of the food he had gorged on. And it was all free, courtesy of Sasuke! Naruto could barely keep himself from drooling as he finally left the bed, the thought of food floating through his mind. He stretched as tall as he was before a content sigh left him as he relaxed, his hand smacking his flat abdo-

He paused for a moment. Something felt off. He gave his stomach another pat, feeling it give under his palm. His stomach felt a lot less firm, and a lot more bloated than he was used to. Taking a peek down, he came face to gut with... Well, a gut. He blinked for a bit, mildly confused at the somewhat malleable mass that used to be a pretty trim stomach.

He had to admit that he was a bit curious about it, so he trudged towards the mirror to get a better look.

"Huh..." Naruto mumbled as he stared at himself in the mirror, rubbing the soft mass. "That's new."

It wasn't all that big really, not on the level of Chouji or Teuchi Ichiraku. Barely a potbelly if anything. It was there though, and while it was soft, it still had a certain firmness to it. He played with the thought of himself simply being bloated from the day before. (Barely stopping himself from drooling again at the thought of all the ramen he ate yesterday.)

That was not it though, as he felt the beginning pangs of hunger slowly entering his mind. His gut agreed, emitting an audible grumble at its current non-stuffed state.

Giving his new addition another rub, he took an inquisitive look at the rest of himself. Rubbing his sides, he felt that yes, there was definitely more flesh there, he couldn't really grab any of it though, so it didn't really worry him at all. His chest was a bit less defined, and a bit softer to the touch, but nothing really noteworthy. Arms and legs had another extra layer of flesh on them, same with his hips, though all it really did was give him a slightly wider look.

Giving his face a scrutinizing look, he tried to see any visible changes. It might be a tiny bit softer, though he couldn't really tell.

He gave his body another look before shrugging, starting his morning routine, banishing any thoughts about his body from his head. It was nothing to worry about. There was a lot of ninja's out there that was pretty damn rotund. Heck, Chouji's entire clan all varied from pretty chubby to huge, and they were all kickass.

Really, some extra pounds basically just gave him the excuse he needed to continue eating out with Sasuke.

He had just finished his morning wash when a knock was heard on his door, the Uchiha's familiar voice piercing through the wood.

"One moment!"

Naruto stared at the two orange pants in front of him, the two of them basically identical to anyone but the blonde. Should he go with the buttoned-up pants, or the stretchy sweat-pants...

Another growl left his stomach, basically making the choice for him as he dropped the buttoned pants. Stretchy it is.

Throwing on one of his black T-shirts, (Which he noticed was a tighter fit than expected) he threw open his front door before almost bolting out, basically dragging Sasuke with him as he strided through the streets, missing the appreciative looks the raven-head sent him, and ignoring the complaints that was thrown at him from his friend.

Not that Sasuke was all that miffed, seeing as this was a pretty normal occurence, the whole being-dragged-somewhere-else thing.

Naruto looked around, his mind going over the alternatives before his gut gave another growl.

He wanted something filling today...

For the longest time he'd noticed how abnormally thin Naruto was. He didn't like it. He'd had a secret crush on the blonde for a year now... since the end of the chuunin exams. “Hey kid, why so down?”

A series of slurps, gulps and grunts followed his inquiry, and a fond sigh left Teuchi Ichiraku.

“I've known you for years Naruto, but that doesn't mean I can understand you any better while you're stuffing your face.” He glanced at the increasing stack of bowls. “That, and you never eat this much unless you're competing against someone, or you're upset for some reason.”

Another series of slurps, then one massive gulp saw the end of the ramen-bowl's content, the blonde setting it down with a sheepish grin, which was soon followed by a burp.

“Sorry.” He said, his hands settling atop his stuffed gut, the full globe pressing harshly against his jacket. “It's just, I've been trying to beef up for a while, ya know, get bigger. Nothing I've done seem to be helping though.” He reached for the bowl the ramen owner put before him, his gut pleading for mercy, yet also pleading for more of that delicious ramen.

“Well, I can't really say that I'm an expert on that... Have you tried asking your teacher.”

“Mhm.” He grunted, slurping down his ramen. He paused for a moment, “And he didn't really have any tips to give, just 'do your exercises' which I've been doing for years, and they're not really helping me with getting any bigger.” And then he went back to his already half-empty bowl.

“Well, that's a shame.” Filling up another bowl, he slid it towards the gorging boy, stacking the now empty bowl atop the tower the blonde was creating. “Have you tried asking any of your friends? Maybe they've got some tips.”

A grunt left the boy before he cleared his mouth. “I did, and I'm really grateful for their help, though they didn't really do much, their tips that is.” Another moutful of ramen. “Chouji's training really only helps people of his clan, ya know, with getting them all gigantic and stuff, and Kiba's method really only helps you get more in synch with your animal partner. Was a lot of meat in his diet apparently.” And then straight back into the bowl he dived.

“A lot of meat, eh...” Something was coming back to him as he stirred the large pot of broth. “They've probably got a special diet for their more intense moves, those clans.”

“Yeah.” Slurp. “Apparently, they take a lot of energy, not only chakra but also energy from their body, and I can believe that. I mean, they turn into giants and great wolf-beasts, awesome stuff like that has gotta take a lot of energy!”

“A lot of energy... Like calories...?” Teuchi mumbled to himself as he put the rest of the ramen in an extra large bowl and gave it to Naruto, ignoring the way the zipper on the gorging teen's jacket was slowly being pried apart by the boy's growing globular gut.

“Give me a moment, I think I have something back here.” A grunt was his answer, and he shook his head in fond exasperation. Entering the back room, he searched through a few drawers before finding what he was looking for. Taking a quick look through the small book, he gave a nod to himself, satisfied that his inkling was correct.

Leaving the back room, he came upon a dopily smiling teen, the boy's hands resting comfortably atop the overfilled, exposed stomach, jacket having given up the fight with the growing mass with that last bigger serving.

“Satisfied?”

“Oh yeah.” A burp left the blonde, one of his hands softly massaging the tight skin.

“That's good to hear. Take this.” The blonde took the book in his hands, looking at it before looking at the aging man, the question clear on his face.

“It's a copy of a cookbook my father made, filled with recipes that he used when he served his clients. I didn't go into the same food-making industry as him though, so I never got much, if any use of it.” He knocked on the hard cover the book wore. “If that there can't help beef you up to a bigger size, then I honestly have no idea if anything ever will.”

“Oh.” Giving the book another glance, he soon sent a blinding smile towards the ramen chef. “Thank you so much, old man Ichiraku! I'll definitely try this out for a while!”

A nod and a smile was given back. As the blonde slowly stood from his seat, the chef gained his attention one more time.

“Just a quick warning that basically all of the recipes in that book is really heavy, so don't expect to exercise right after your meal. In fact, I would recommend a short nap after the meals.”

“I'll keep that in mind.” With another smile, and a small bundle of cash left on the counter, the blonde unsteadily made his way homewards, Teuchi finally moving the tower of bowls over to the sink.

“I wonder if I should have told him that my father's clients were traditionally people that needed to gain a large amount of weight in a very short amount of time... Ehh.” He shrugged, starting on cleaning the bowls. “The kid needs to get some meat on his bones, and the extra poundage'll probably help him punch crooks harder.” Happy with that, and his mind at peace, he slowly worked at the dishes through the night.

He had seen a lot during his few years as a ninja. Freaky people with extra limbs and heads, gigantic talking animals, gigantic animalistic chakra monsters, he had even seen Chouji say no too a free meal!

Raising his head, the dog had to hold in a whine of longing, as the portly boy's soft belly would undoubtly be a fantastic pillow. So squishy... Staring at Kiba, he cocked his head to the side, as if to say 'That's him alright. What'cha going to do?' Hopefully convince the blonde to let him use that wonderful belly as a pillow.

Pausing for a moment, Naruto thought about it for a moment before sending an appreciative smile towards the tattoed boy. “Sure, I'd like that. Haven't really been around the others much lately, I've been kinda busy trying out a new bulking method.” Sitting up fully, (And pushing Kiba back slightly with his gut) he smacked his side, overlooking the softness and the jiggling. “Dunno how well it's doing, but my clothes has started getting a bit tighter, so I guess it's working.”

“Really, I couldn't tell.” Except for the fat gut, the small man-boobs, love-handles and double-chin that is. He had to admit that the double-chin really suited the teen's face.

“Yeah. Anyway, I was supposed to train, so if you-”

'GRRRROWL'

The three of them froze for a moment, before looking down at the origin of the sound. Blushing, Naruto patted the side of his stomach, a sheepish smile stretching across his face. Smirking, Kiba poked the soft flesh, his finger sinking into it. “Sounds like someone's hungry.”

“I guess a bit.” Averting his eyes, he stared at the clearing around him, his face conflicted. “I was supposed to train though...”

“Well,” Standing up, he reached his hand down for the blonde to take. “Training on an empty stomach ain't any fun now, is it? Let's fill that monster up before it starts devouring us.” He couldn't help but snort, the gut growling after he said that, apparently agreeing with him.

Naruto was about to argue, but another growl left his stomach, and the first true pangs of hunger started to enter his mind.

“Oh well, the training grounds aren't going anywhere.” Grabbing the hand, the two of them hauled him up, Kiba having to use more strength than he thought. Bending down to grab his T-shirt, (Having to struggle a bit, and Kiba watching the pants heroically trying to stay together) Naruto pulled it over his head, the clothing barely reaching down to his belly button, and even then it didn't cover all of it, the love-handles spilling out at the sides.

“Oh, that reminds me!” He looked at the dog-team, the duo following behind him, getting a good look at his butt, the seat of his pants stretching quite nicely over the growing buttocks. “I've really gotten into making food lately, do the two of you want any?”
11513212.title: Only eating and sleeping does not make muscles.

choices: Kept a strict workout regiment, and was starting to see results.
Was just as lazy as Naruto, and was oblivious to the effects.
115132121.content:
Kiba and Akamaru decided that they would have some of Naruto's food with him.

"Wait. You? Cooking?! I never thought I'd see the day!" Kiba teased. Naruto said, "What's that supposed to mean? Cooking is actually pretty easy! I'm getting good at it!" "I'll believe it when I see it." Kiba replied.

As the three made their way to Naruto's place, it was clear that Naruto had not lost his energy or enthusiasm. He actually seemed really excited to have guests. Kiba and Akamaru watched as, with each step, Naruto's new belly would wobble. They saw just how tight Naruto's pants were, and Kiba was right; Naruto's pant's weren't even close to falling off!

Regardless, after some idle conversation, the three had arrived. Naruto's apartment was messy, but it had seen worse days, and it was actually decent enough for guests. Kiba sat at Naruto's table. "So let me guess, you're making ramen?" Kiba asked sarcastically. Naruto just beamed and said, "What else would I make?" Kiba then said, "Well in that case, give me plenty of steak on mine."

As Naruto cooked two pots of ramen in the kitchen, which he kept surprisingly clean now, he said, "I can really pack this stuff away if I wanted to!". Kiba said, "Is that so, dog breath? I bet I can eat more than you in one sitting!". Naruto brushed Kiba off, saying, "In your dreams! I can eat a whole pot by myself!". "Then let's make it a challenge!" Kiba said. "Fine by me!" Naruto replied as he got another pot out and started making even more, just in case.

Akamaru whined, 'You know you're gonna end up just like him?' Kiba said under his breath, "Don't worry about it. This way, he'll push himself to eat more. Besides, I can just work it off!" Akamaru seemed satisfied with that answer. He sat by the end of the table. From his vantage point, he'd be able to see both bellies from the side.

After plenty of hard work, Naruto brought out two pots of ramen, one for himself and one for Kiba. "I figured since dogs like meat, I just made Akamaru a steak. I hope he likes it rare!" Kiba then said, "Akamaru's gonna love it. The rarer, the better!" Akamaru wagged his tail and barked in agreement. Naruto handed Akamaru his steak, then he sat down with Kiba.

The two began chowing down, right from the pots. Kiba and Akamaru were amazed that Naruto's cooking was actually pretty good. Kiba said "You make a mean batch of ramen, Naruto!" between bites.

While Kiba went to eat the steak first, Naruto went right for the noodles, scooping out lots at a time with his chopsticks. Since Naruto's belly was already quite large, it didn't seem to bulge out noticeably at first. Kiba's, meanwhile, began to distend as he started on the noodles.

The two continued through their ramen, both of their bellies distending out farther and farther as they went. At this point, Akamaru was done and full, so he was watching the show. Kiba unzipped his jacket when he felt it start to strain a lot. This led to his distended belly pushing out a bit, and it was starting to stretch his netted shirt.

Soon enough, both of them had gotten to the broth. Almost simultaneously, both Naruto and Kiba took their pots and tip them up, letting the broth spill into their mouths. Akamaru watched in awe as their bellies now bloated out at a lightning pace. While Naruto was shirtless and his belly was free to grow, Kiba had his net shirt on, and soon after finishing the broth, one of the strings snapped, causing a chain reaction that broke the front of his shirt.

His belly was rock hard, and he didn't know if he'd ever eaten this much in his life. Naruto had the layer of fat to keep his soft, but now, the table was starting to cut into it. Naruto then said, "I guess we need a tie breaker!" as he got up to bring in the third pot. Kiba was amazed that Naruto was willing to keep going, so he psyched himself up to keep going.

Naruto brought out a stack of bowls this time, and whoever had the higher stack would win. Kiba made it through a few more bowl, but at that point, Naruto had eaten half the pot! Kiba let Naruto finish the rest, and he was amazed by the sight. Naruto's belly was now the size of a beachball! He belched loudly before saying, "Man, that was good." He looked at Kiba's stack of bowls saying, "Looks like someone underestimated me!"

Kiba looked green in the face. He was just rubbing his own belly to try to soothe it. "And the best part is that this food is designed to help people bulk up! I'll be ripped in no time!" Naruto said. Kiba and Akamaru looked at each other in amazement by how oblivious Naruto was, but either way, that explained why Naruto had gained so quickly.

Regardless, Kiba said, "I should eat here more often. That was great!". Naruto joked, "I should start charging!". Kiba then said, "I could help with ingredients.". Soon after, all three of them had fallen asleep. Naruto snored as his huge belly rose and fell. Kiba was on Naruto's couch in a similar predicament.

The two ate together for nearly every meal for the next week. Neither of them had much to do, and Kiba's mom and sister were both on long missions. Regardless, as the week wore one, Kiba...
115132121.title: "Sure, why not."

He completely underestimated the fattening effects of the food.
1151321211.content:
A content sigh left Kiba as he laid down in his bed, his mind and body satisfied with the day. He felt the hairy head of his companion rest on his stomach, and he gave the canine a few strokes, a happy rumble leaving him.

'You've chubbed up a bit.' Akamaru finally ruffed, not moving from his spot.

“I know.” The dog-boy agreed, continuing with the petting. “I guess that's why you've really started laying on me though, eh?”

A huff was heard, neither denying nor confirming, yet Kiba knew the answer, a small grin showing. It wasn't a lot by any means, merely some extra padding here and there, some extra fat around his stomach, nothing to worry about. He hadn't really seen any other results yet though...

“I should up my training.” Kiba muttered, another sigh leaving him, a part of him not wanting to do any more exercising than he was already doing, yet a bigger part really wanted to show off a bit, all big and bulky.

'At least you're doing more than Naruto's doing.' Here, Akamaru raised his head and poked the padded mass below him with his snout. 'Eating less too.'

Snickering at that, he scratched behind one of the dog's ears, the dog going limp at the attention.

“Can't deny the truth.” It was impressive really. While Kiba had (somewhat) managed to reign in his appetite, not stuffing himself each meal, Naruto seemingly was doing the opposite, filling his gut to the brim each meal. It showed too...

“I wonder if he's ever going to start with his training again.” His mind flitted to the growing middle the blonde was sporting, apparently oblivious to his rapidly balloning physique.

'That's for him to decide.' The hound huffed. 'When he finally realises his size, he'll probably get up from his lazy ass. Plus,' his tail wagged, amusement in his voice, 'when he finally DO notice, it'll probably be hilarious.'

“Oh yeah, that'll be great.”

11513212111.content:
“Hah, seems like I'm finally starting to see some results, eh?”

Kiba sent a giddy smirk towards his dog companion, flexing his newly formed mass to punctuate his point. Akamaru simply rolled his eyes (as best a dog can do) and went back to cleaning his paws.

'Yeah, yeah. You've been bragging about that all morning.'

Of course, that didn't mean it wasn't impressive. If one had to call the dog-lover one thing before his run-in with Naruto, it was thin. Wiry at best, but with no clear muscles to speak off.

Now though, he had already started bulking up. Of course, due to the food being ludicrously nutrient and (obviously) calorie filled, a decent amount of what he'd gained had been fat, but due to his pretty intensive training, his fat-filled form had started to attain a pretty strong and visible undercurrent of muscles.

His biceps and triceps were already stretching the arms of his jackets and shirts to their limits, having turned form-fitting after a mere two weeks, and the slight, but noticeable width he had gained across his shoulders didn't help the struggling clothes any.

His chest was broader, along with a soft-yet-solid mass that was slightly protruding from his abdomen, adding to the struggle his clothes faced in increased amounts each day.

His legs had also bulked up but not to the extent as the rest of the body. It weren't really all that noticeable underneath his clothes. He should stop skipping leg-day.

All in all, he was starting to look solid. He still had a way to go to really start looking like a powerhouse, but this was definitely not a bad start.

A growl filled Kiba's room, and a giddy smile (Giddier than before Akamaru noted) stretched across his unchanged face.

“Alright, breakfast soon!” Putting on a tight T-shirt and a not-much-better jacket, the teen vaulted out the window, the white hound following along besides the bounding teen.

'So.' The dog started, letting his tongue fall out. 'What do you think he's gonna make today?'

“Dunno for breakfast and lunch, but I was promised something meaty and greasy for dinner today, and I won't let Naruto get out of that! Plus,” A cheeky grin was sent Akamaru's way, “I think I've earned a splurging day, eh?”

'Sure, whatever.' The canine sighed, knowing it wouldn't be his problem if Kiba chubbed up more than he wanted.

The duo landed before Naruto's door, the nin barely knocking before entering the apartment, Akamaru once again rolling his eyes at his nearly salivating partner.

“Oy, Naruto, what'cha cooking?!” Kiba almost shouted, Akamaru finally entering the abode in dismay at his loud friend, the dog's eyes landing on the target of Kiba's enthusiasm.
11513212111.title: Starting to bulk out.

choices: With some coercion, Naruto chugs down the remaining pot.
Nope, not getting any more food into him, so Kiba will have to finish it.
115132121111.content:
“Geeze, dog-breath. No 'hello', no 'how are ya', just nagging about the grub. Rude.” While his tone was condescending (Which was a tone they didn't realize he had before they joined him for meals), the teasing smirk and giddy glint in his eyes told a different story.

Joining Naruto's side at the table, Kiba threw a quick look at the nimble clone currently cooking up a feast before his eyes returned to the corpulent blonde beside him, said blonde lazily slumping in his chair without a shirt on, showing off his form.

“Yeah, well, gotta use your lazy ass for something.” He snarked back, earning a kick which he manly (With a tear in his eye and a grimace) ignored in favor of looking the blonde over.

In direct contrast with Kiba, Naruto had seemingly forgotten all thoughts about his original purpose of the diet, and had taken this as an opportunity to relax and hang around the dog-nin. And, unlike the dog-nin, had seemed to lose all restraints when it came to gorging himself silly at every chance.

Naruto's face, (Which he noticed had a small spot of chocolate at the corner of his mouth, showing that he had already started the day with a snack) which had lost all the baby-fat from his youth had gained it back several-folds. His cheeks were round, stretching his whisker-like marks out somewhat, and his double-chin covered what neck he had, the hanging flesh seemingly moments away from gaining another friend.

He was a lot wider than even a week ago, the fat on his shoulders covering what neck his double-chin didn't, and his arms had blimped up, covering the limbs in several layers of fat, the adipose jiggling whenever he used them. Even the fingers had become bigger, resembling sausages more and more as the days passed.

His chest was surprisingly small considering his size, though it still put his female team-mate's own pair to shame. Then again, hers were probably a bit firmer than Naruto's flabby pecs.

His butt and legs had expanded tremendously, quickly forcing the fat blonde to stop using his normal pants and switching over to a larger pair of orange sweat-pants, else he'd rip them apart due to his growth. His thighs had expanded to such a degree that it forced Naruto to waddle wherever he went, sending his entire body wobbling along. Not that he seemed to notice.

And then the grand prize which expanded further and wider than any other part of him. Sitting a mere inch away from his knees, the massive mass of flesh quivered with each breath and slight movement the blonde did, the great gut a true testament to the blonde's dive into gluttony. It wrapped around his torso, forming several folds and love-handles that made him seem even wider, making his fattened-up arms slightly struggle with resting straight down.

Not that he did that much anyway, sitting as he did now, his corpulent arms resting atop that globular gut of his, the mass looking even more bloated after the obviously large snack he had earlier.

Soon, the still-thin clone set the food at the table, Kiba rolling his eyes in good humor at the multitude of pots filled with ramen.

“Why am I not surprised?” He grumbled, serving himself a large serving of the feast before him, Naruto beside him already having stuffed some noodles in his mouth.

Slurping them up, he sent a grin Kiba's way, raising more noodles to his mouth. “Hey, you'll get some delicious meat later, so I get some delicious ramen now.” With that, he went back to the gorging, the clone setting down a nice steak for Akamaru before dispelling.

It was relatively silent as they ate, if one ignored the slurping and grunting from both of them. Even from Akamaru's angle though, it was quite easy to see who ate more out of the two of them, the slowly inflating middle of the blonde quickly telling him the answer.

Shaking his head, the dog curled up for a nap, satisfied with his steak.

Filling up his large bowl with seconds, Kiba sent a glance at his friend, the glance turning into a stare as he looked at the gorging blonde.

Having already finished off one of the hefty pots, the blonde had seemingly given up on his bowl and just dove straight into a second pot. His gut,large before the meal, was already looking quite bloated after the first pot, having expanded in all directions. The addition of the second pot, which was gulped up at an extreme pace by Naruto, only increased the bloated look.

Kiba stared on as Naruto's gut slowly grew, finally passing his knees, and growing wider and wider, making his love-handles look even bigger stretching his sweatpants slightly. Even the top was starting to edge upwards.

As the end of the second pot was found, Naruto's stomach grazed the table even with the distance he sat from it. Licking both his lips and the pot clean, he let out a burp and a sigh as he put his arm to the side, letting the pot hit the floor, a smile on his chubby face. Soon though, his eyes zeroed in on the third and biggest pot, and he started to stretch towards it.

Mesmerized, Kiba lifted the huge, almost over-filled pot of ramen to the blonde, his own bowl and significantly smaller pot forgotten. With a giddy smile Naruto tilted the large pot, sending a steady stream of broth and noodles down his gaping mouth, gulping it up as quickly as possible, not a drop being wasted.

Most people would be surprised that Naruto managed to gulp down ramen without spilling any, but it wouldn't surprise Kiba in the slightest if Naruto had mastered the art of rapid ramen consumption.

Slowly growing larger and larger, Kiba watched as the blonde's gut expand, slowly pressing more and more into the table, forcing his love-handles bigger, his pants wider, and pushing his fat pecs higher. As it grew larger though, Kiba noticed that Naruto chugged down the ramen slower than before, apparently nearing his limit.

'This.' Naruto thought to himself as the pressure in his stomach grew stronger. 'Might have been a bad idea.' It was quite understandable too, as the amount of food he had consumed was already more than he had ever eaten in one sitting, and he still had half the pot to go.

Noticing the struggle Naruto was in, Kiba grew an impish grin as an idea sprung to his find. Patting the massively bloated mass in a patronizing way, Kiba gave the blonde a challenging look.

“Come on man, giving up already? Laaaaame, I thought you were better than that!”

Letting out a massive burp, Naruto looked at Kiba with ire in his eyes. “Says you who've barely eaten anything.”

“Yeah, well, not everyone loves ramen like you do.” His smirk grew wider, slightly pressing into the still-soft mass of flesh. “Or are you telling me you don't love the stuff anymore?”

That seemingly did it, as with an angry “I'll show you who doesn't love ramen!”, the blonde lifted the pot back up, regaining his previous fervor.

With each massive gulp that sent a tremor through his body, Naruto's stomach continued to expand to greater sizes, digging further and further into the table, getting wider and wider, taller and taller. Kiba kept his hand on the expanding adipose, feeling as it slowly moved and rose, the smirk on his face growing wider.

Finally, the end of the pot approached, a sheen of sweat having appeared on Naruto's brow with the absolutely ludicrous amount of food he had forced into himself, far greater than any amount before. As the final drop fell into his mouth, Naruto swallowed, then groaned in both pain and success. He sent a dopey look towards Kiba as the dog-boy took the pot away from him, victory clear on his face.

“Now... Who doesn't... Love ramen?” He panted, his arms laying limp atop the monumental girth he was sporting.

“Hmm, I dunno. After all, there's still a lot of this pot left.” He lifted the mostly-full pot that was left, which while not the smallest one, it still wasn't as big as the last one.

With a groan Naruto stared at the last pot, a pensive frown on his face.

“Come on, it's still delicious.” He let the aroma of the ramen hit the blonde, looking at the calculating look on Naruto's face.

Due to it's overfilled state, not only had it expanded outwards and upwards, but also sideways, making him look even wider than he actually was, stretching his sweatpants even more. Still...

“Ehh, what's this pot compared to the rest?” He brought the ramen closer to the corpulent blonde, using his foot to sneakily push the table to the side and away from the packed gut to ease the blonde's discomfort while Naruto focused on the meal.

Another low groan was his answer as Naruto stared at the noodles, his hunger for ramen still rearing it's head, yet the state of his gut made him hesitate. Another idea flicked through Kiba's mind.

“What if I hold and tilt, and you just gulp it down as fast as possible? We'll probably get rid of it before your gut says no.”

Naruto frowned as his eyes flicked between the oh-so delicious food and Kiba's eager face. He always wanted more ramen, but this was really starting to overdo it. Still though, it was ramen...

A growl left his gut, and the two of them looked at it in wonder, mistaking the churning sound for hunger. Kiba's gleeful smile stretched wider as he brought the pot over Naruto's head, ready to tilt it.

“Well, the gut has spoken, now open up!”

Having no other choice (Not that he was resisting at that point), Naruto tilted his head back and opened his mouth wide, silently pleased when the noodles and broth hit his tongue. Slumping a bit, he gulped it down rapidly, his thick hands slowly massaging his aching gut, feeling the overfilled mass slowly stretch underneath his touch, a small thrill going through him despite the discomfort.

Kiba, while keeping a steady stream going, kept an eye on the expanding adipose, watching it fill up even more, getting wider and taller, stretching the sweatpants even more, slowly edging further and further away.

'Even Chouji would struggle with this amount.' He mused to himself, feeling the weight in his hands lessen slowly but surely as a steady stream disappeared down Naruto's gullet.

In a way, Kiba had to admit to himself that he was pretty impressed.

Alas, not everything good could last forever, as soon enough, the end of the last pot was rapidly approaching. Just in time too it sounded like, as the chair Naruto was currently slumping in was sending out some rather alarming sounds.

With one last gulp, Naruto let out a sigh, panting where he sat with his eyes closed. Only drops fell from the pot, and Kiba finally put it back on the table beside his own forgotten (Still warm somehow) bowl of ramen.

“Ohhh.” The blonde moaned in a food-drunken stupor, arms resting lazily atop his massive belly. “I... Kinda Hic overdid it...”

'Gee, you think?' Akamaru snarked, having woken up when Kiba put the cooking pot back on the table. 'Any more, and he'd probably blow.'

Poking the blonde's side, he had to agree with Akamaru that yeah, it wouldn't really be a good idea to force any more food into him.

'Seriously though, how're we going to get him outta that chair before it breaks?'

“You underestimate my stubborness.” Kiba snorted as he gave Naruto's side a few pats, watching the fat jiggle as he did so.

“Oy, we gonna move you now.” With that, he grabbed one of Naruto's hand and janked on it. Naruto, having no other choice, slid off the chair on to his feet, almost falling over due to the overfilled mass that he called a stomach sloshed and jiggled back and forth, throwing off his balance, and the sharp ache that went through it.

“Dammit Pant dog-breath, warn me Pant next time!” Another groan left him after that as he gently massaged what he could of the massively protruding adipose, his arms sinking in despite the ballooning look it had, a small sloshing sound being heard due to all the liquid inside of it.

“Yeah yeah, whatever. Come here now.” Kiba threw an arm around the blonde as best as he could, sinking into the soft mass as he slowly helped the massively overstuffed teen lumber over to his bed, his body, especially his stomach wobbling all the way.

“Just woke up, and already going back to bed. Lazy, lazy.” He teased, grinning at the blonde in good humor, the corpulent one rolling his eyes as he slowly sunk into the mattress, the bed only slightly creaking.

“S' your fault, making me eat that last bit.” Still, a gloating smirk stretched across his face as he laid back, his stomach standing tall and proud as a testament to his gluttony even as it sunk a bit to the sides, framing his torso.

“Blame it on me, will ya. Just so you know, I still expect my meaty dinner later today.” Patting the wobbling adipose, he went back to the table to finish his bowl, a soft “Sure” emanating from behind him which was soon followed by soft breaths.

'I know that look.' Akamaru said, staring at his eating partner. 'You're going to stuff him like a turkey, aren't you.' It wasn't a question.

“Jupp.”

Sighing, Akamaru gave Kiba a disapproving-yet-playful look. 'I expect some extra meat during meals to keep my silence.'

“Deal.”

Looking at the slumbering blonde, a thought hit the dog.

'You sure he'll be able to actually make lunch and dinner though? He looks pretty conked out.'

"And that," he slurped up the rest of the ramen. "Is not a problem, as I know where his recipes are. Worst case scenario, I'll make the food myself."

Grinning at the canine, he stood up and patted his stomach in contentment. "After all, if Naruto of all people manages to make some good food while following those recipes, then pretty much everyone should be able to do the same."

Akamaru had been somewhat skeptical about this so-called bulking food that Naruto served. Surely, there had to be some other reason for his extraordinary gain in such a small window of time. Maybe a technique or something that Sakura had come up with to help one of her best friends. He highly doubted it could only be the food, no matter what you put in it.

Of course, these doubts flew out the window pretty quickly as he watched the two of them slowly inflate with fat for each day, the food and their gluttony being far more effective than Akamaru had initially thought. This was even more exasparated by their competetive spirits, making the two of them basically glut themselves to stupidity during each meal.

Kiba, in just over a week, had already outgrown his clothes. Of course, Akamaru didn't complain too much about that, the new flesh on the dog-boy being quite the comfortable pillow for the hound, the last few days having given him some fantastic nights of sleep. If only he could lie on it...

His face had softened slightly, though nothing all that noticeable, with slightly thicker arms and chest.

All in all, he was still not as big as Naruto was when they found him napping in the woods. Another week of glutting himself like this though...

A creak shifted his attention from his life-friend to the blonde, the home-cook nibbling on some leftover food despite the massive gut resting on his lap, and the fact that the chair he was sitting on was making some alarming sounds.

He might think that Kiba had been chubbing up something fierce, though it was nothing compared to Naruto. Driven on by not only his own obliviousness and his wish to get bigger, but also by the competitiveness he shared with Kiba at every meal, the weight he had previously put on had almost found itself doubled, something both Kiba and Akamaru had thought an impossible task.

There was no way around it, Naruto was Fat, with a capital F. With each day, the dog team had slowly watched the blonde's gut slowly grow along his lap. The expanding adipose, while empty, having passed the midway point a few days ago, and having steadily enroached upon the massively bloated teen's knees. Akamaru was surprised at how well the blonde's gut held itself up while he was standing, at least compared to Kiba's growing tum that had already started gaining a bit of a droop.

'Guess people hold their fat differently.' The mutt mused, glancing between the two once again eating teens, the pair finishing off whatever was left on the table. Really, did they ever stop eating?

The sparetire that was his love-handles had expanded even bigger, having grown past the handfull that they were before, stretching out and making even the new, bigger shirts they've gotten for him form-fitting, having blown the stitches on the old shirts after he tried them on after their first meal together. 12112.content:
'Okay Hinata, he's right there, just go over there and talk to him,' Hinata told her self as she mentally prepared herself for the daunting task before her.

She stood in the bushes on the edge of a clearing where her blond haired idol was training.

Having finally gathered the necessary courage, Hinata took a deep breath, and stepped out of the bushes.

Naruto, being so absorbed in his training didn't even notice her, so after a minute of just standing there, Hinata cleared her throat to attract his attention.

"Oh, hey Hinata," Naruto shouted to her in a cheerful tone, having finally noticed her. "What's up?"

"Nothing, Naruto-kun," Hinata stuttered. "I was just wondering, if you're not to busy, would you, maybe, like to get some ramen, with me." Hinata squeaked out the last part.

"Sure thing Hinata," Naruto said, never one to turn down ramen. "I'd love to, but I need to finish training." Naruto muttered the last part in disappointment.

"But N-Naruto-kun, you've been working so hard, surely you deserve a break," Hinata said, knowing that Naruto would take any excuse to get some ramen.

"You know what, you're right Hinata! I have been training hard, and I do deserve a ramen break. Come on, let's go." With that, Naruto grabbed her hand and started dragging her towards the ramen stand where he always ate.

Hinata, through supreme force of will, just barely managed to avoid fainting. As they headed towards the ramen stand, Hinata couldn't help but smile, not just because Naruto was holding her hand, but because of how well her plan was going. For the longest time, Hinata had admired Naruto and she for just as long she had fantasized about how much cuter he were fat. And not just chubby, but obese. Maybe even, dare she think it, immobile!

So, she recently decided to act upon these dreams and devised a plan to make her dreams a reality and now she was finally putting it into action.

When they arrived at the ramen stand, Naruto immediately placed his usual order of 12 ramen bowls and Hinata ordered the same, knowing she wouldn't be able to finish it. She ignored the odd looks she recieved, and simply focused on Naruto, immagining how huge he would be once she had completed her plan.

The orders soon arrived and as she predicted, Hinata felt too full to finish the rest after the first two bowls.

"Naruto-kun, I seem to have ordered too much and I c-can't finish it. Could you please do it for me?" Hinata whispered to him.

"Sure thing Hinata," Naruto yelled, hating to see food wasted.

After about 20 minuites, Naruto had finished all the ramen while Hinata simply watched. By this point, Naruto was feeling pretty full and was getting ready to leave.
When Hinata noticed this she said, "wait, Naruto-kun! Don't you want some more! After all, you've worked so hard, you deffinatly deserve it."

And Naruto couldn't help but agree with her. And so it continued for the next 40 or so minutes. Naruto would eat more and more ramen, ignoring the growing tightness in his stomach and his jacket, as Hinata encouraged him with phrases like, "you deserve it," "you need to keep your strength up for all that training," and "I know you can finish it Naruto-kun."

Finally, Naruto could ignore it no more and decided that he had had enough and went to leave. By this point, Naruto's gut was extended like a several inches out, spliting open his jacket and causing his shirt to ride up, and was completely taunt.

As Naruto was standing up, Hinata rushed to his side, after paying for the meal. She immediatly apologized for having made him over eat so much. Naruto just waved it off saying he enjoyed it and that he can easily just work it off in training. still Hinata insisted on walking him home.

When they arrived, Hinata noticed Naruto making a slight wince.

"Naruto-kun! What's wrong?!" Hinata gasped out in alarm and worry.

"Oh, it's nothing Hinata, my stomach just hurts a little."

"Oh, well here, let me help you, oh I knew I shouldn't have made you over eat so much." And with that she led him over to his bed and made him lie down on it, giving him no room for arguement. She then began to gently rub his over stuffed belly, pushing a small amount of chakra in to help sooth Naruto.

Naruto was soon yawning and fast asleep under Hinata's ministrations.

When Hinata was certain he was asleep, she stopped and made the hand signs for her newest justu.

"Shadow clone justsu," she whispered, being careful not to awaken Naruto.

And then there were three poofs of smoke, and from then emerged three more Hinatas.

And without any need for communication, they each set off to complete their part of the plan. The first clone set out into Naruto's kitchen, and began replacing all of his ramen, which was the only food he really had, and replacing them with larger, more fattening ones. The second went into Naruto's waredrobe and started to do a little bit of sowwing work, making Naruto's clothes all slightly looser, so that Naruto wouldn't notice his weight gain. The third began to gently inscribe a seal on Naruto's back, after gently rolling him over. The seal would constantly suck chakra out of Naruto, and Naruto, given his short attention span and horrid chakra control, would never notice. This would make all training exercises that much harder for Naruto and would make him think he's done more training than he actually has. She then began to construct a seal that would cast a constant henge over Naruto, hiding both his gain and that his clothes were getting larger, using chakra from the first seal, so as to truely keep Naruto in the dark about it. Finally, she included one last seal which would act as both a chakra transferer and disrupter. Simply put, it will ruin Naruto's chakra control even further, making ninjutsu training much harder, as well as taking the chakra that is absorbed from Naruto and transfer it to another seal that Hinata has allowing her use Naruto's chakra to strength herself.

After all, she'll need it. Not only does she have to continue tricking Naruto until he is too far along in the fattening process to lose the weight and even then, she still needs to be able take care of him, because as things progress, he will become less and less able to do so himself, until he finally becomes immobile. Oh, Hinata was becoming aroused just thinking about it.

Meanwhile, the origional Hinata began the most crucial, and most enjoyable portion of her plan. First, she gently began to rub Naruto's belly again, only this time the chakra was beging used not just to sooth Naruto and keep him asleep, but also to help speed up the digestion process and convert it all to fat. Next, she moved on to Naruto's muscles, only this time the chakra was being used to cause the muscles to shrink, again making training harder for Naruto and preventing him from wokring it off.

All these factors would combine to make Naruto both fatter and weaker, and thus more dependent on her and lazier. If things continued this smoothly, then Hinata would soon become an irreplacable part of the life of an obese Naruto.

With that thought in mind, Hinata silently crept out with a smile on her face, telling her clones to dispell themselves as soon as they finished their tasks.
