121121.content:
The next day Hinata 'coincidentally' met Naruto at his training grounds around lunch time. An extremely large lunch basket in her hands, filled to the brim with delicious food. She needed to reduce Naruto's frequentcy to Ichiruku ramen. The second part of Hinata's plan was much eaiser than the first. She needed to take Naruto to different restaurants each day so that Teichu and Ayame from the Ramen stand could in no way inhibit her plans. If they noticed Naruto eating more they might comment.

When Naruto noticed her presence he grinned widely at her, causing the girl to smile shyly in response. Naruto walked up to her with an easy grace, but she noticed with a great deal of satisfaction, that he did so slower than he normally would. There was a great deal of sweat on the boys brow as well. "What's up Hinata? What are you doing here?" Naruto asked curiously. Now was the time to put her plan into action.

Hinata looked at the floor, making sure to make her lip quiver, and voice tremor. "I... I worked so hard to make this huge picnic for my family, but they canceled on me last minute. It's going to be very embarressing to walk all the way back to the Hyuuga residence with a full picnic basket. People might think I was stood up on a date or something." Hinata whispered out. Oh this was evil, she knew Naruto's kind heart well, and manipulating it was very evil. In this case though evilness paid by the pound.

Naruto raised his hands instantly in a comforting motion. "Hey, hey there, don't be sad. Tell you what, why don't we eat as much of it as possible here and then all take the leftovers home so no one sees you with it full. It's the least I can do after you treated me last night!" Naruto said with a grin. Hinata smiled at him. "Thank you so much Naruto-kun!"

Hinata happily went about setting up the picnic, making sure to place the fattest of the foods in front of the boy, she doubted he knew the difference between extremely loaded potatoes and a small baked potato any way so he wouldn't notice the arrangement. As they dug into the food Hinata conversed with Naruto the whole time, easily enjoying the blondes relaxed cheerful nature, and carefully eating the lightest and lowest calorie food she'd brought. When she noticed Naruto slowing down in eating she boldly remarked that only someone with a particularly strong stomach could stand her food and she understood that Naruto didn't want to eat any more. The alarm and immediate reassurance that she was a wonderful cook followed by the inhaling of food made her feel a bit guilty but she quickly pushed that aside when she thought of the end result.

Twice more Naruto looked like he wanted to throw in the towl but the quiet comments of self doubt from Hinata had Naruto painfully shoving in the last bread role and swallowing with a large grin. He looked a little queasy and his stomach looked ready to pop but the young teen had a triumphant smirk on his lips before letting out a rather large burt. Naruto blushed and rubbed the back of his head with a laugh. "Your cooking was absolutely fantastic Hinata!" Naruto told her sternly. Hinata smiled and nodded. "I'm so glad you liked it, I guess I am a good cook." Hinata said.

Naruto sighed in relief, letting himself fall back onto the grass, his large taut stomach follow his lead and sticking out in the air like a balloon. Hinata got up and walked over to Naruto, sitting directly beside the blonde while he let out a slight groan. "Are you okay Naruto-kun?" Hinata asked gingerly, blushing lightly as she looked at his oversized belly spilling over his pants. The genjutsu would settle around him in a few minutes and he would look normal. "Y-yeah I just ate a little too much." Naruto replied. Hinata smiled. "Would you like me to rub your stomach for you?" She asked softly. Naruto smiled but nodded his head. "I need to get back to training." Naruto told her.

"Surely that can wait a few minutes and beside if your stomach hurts you might make it worse by moving too soon." Hinata pointed out. Naruto thought it over and decided that that made a lot of sense. So Hinata gently tugged up Naruto's black shirt and began her minstruations of the bulging, overstuffed belly, lulling Naruto to sleep in the process. Hinata giggled. That had worked ten times better than she'd anticipated. It was around this time that the genjutsu began to take affect and hid Naruto's newly acquired girth. She sighed sadly, already missing the extra weight on the boy's form. She quickly sealed away the basket in a scroll on her waist and stood.

She trained while Naruto slept, slyly using a genjutsu to keep the boy asleep much longer than a normal nap, and waking him up when dinner time arrived. He awoke with a start and shot up from his lying position. He noted the darkness around them and visbly frowned. "How long did I sleep?" Naruto asked in shock. Hinata smiled. "When you fell asleep I went ahead and brought my basket home and came back and you were still sleeping. You looked really tired, probably from all the hard training you were doing before I got here, so I didn't have the heart to wake you. I decided to train and wait till you woke up, but you never did. I figured you'd probably want to get out of here." Hinata explained easily. Naruto nodded at the explanation in acceptance. Hinata wouldn't lie to him after all.

"Still, I don't normally sleep that long, maybe it was cause I ate so much at lunch?" Naruto asked himself. Hinata panicked on the inside, but smiled on the outside. "I doubt it." Hinata said before gracefully standing up. Naruto moved to do the same and frowned as he felt heavier than he remembered. "Maybe I should cut back on the eating." Naruto muttered. Hinata really panicked now.

Hinata smiled broadly before sticking out a finger and gently poking the toned stomach the genjutsu showed the world. "Seriously Naruto are you going anorexic on me? Your skin and bones you don't need to cut back on eating." Hinata said with a quiet laugh. Naruto looked down at himself before smiling broadly at her and pretending to be insulted. "That is all muscle."
____________________________________________

Hinata some how convinced Naruto to go to a dango shop for dinner. Once more she ordered too much for herself, and puppy eyed Naruto into eating his portion as well as most of hers, which was a generous portion indeed. Then, purely by coincidence and not because Hinata had paid the man off or anything, the chief came out of the back with a huge birthday cake and set it in front of Naruto. The man began to sing a merry birthday tune when Naruto politely apologized and said that it was, indeed, not his birthday. The chef then frowned and said that the person sitting at table nine, their table was to have a cake delivered at seven and if the person hadn't shown up then to claim the cake then it would be thrown away. The chef then smiled hugely and declared that he refused to have decent cake thrown away and that Naruto would take it home with him. Naruto had gaped at the man, trying to tell him that he really shouldn't be having cake, only to have the man burst into tears and scream about how no one wanted his cake. Naruto, being the sweet naive soul he was, felt bad and told him he would eat every bite.

The chef had then turned around with a glint in his eyes and called 'I don't believe you! Prove it!' Shoving a fork into Naruto's hand. Naruto had gaped at the man and then at the cake. However when the chef started to tear up again Naruto had dug into the rather large chocolet cake. Hinata had watched, silently cackling in glee, and noting that she would be tipping the man big for his wonderful performance. Naruto looked just about dead as he forcefully shoved the last bite into his mouth. The teens stomach was enormous and taut. Four inches more and it would have touched the table. Naruto loudly groaned and tried to stand up but found that the task was too much. Luckily Hinata was right there to catch him and slung one of his arms around her shoulder.

"Come on Naruto-kun, we should get you home." Naruto nodded, unable to argue, before they headed in the direction of his apartment. When they entered Naruto sat down on the bed with a groan. Hinata didn't bother asking this time around and quietly began to rub Naruto's tummy, the large thing stretched to the max, Naruto was soon asleep. As she'd done before she gently used her medical knowledge to will the digestion along and into fat as well as sending chakra into his muscles to weaken them.. Then, quickly, Hinata removed the genjutsu to gain a view of the real Naruto.

The bed sagged a little. The belly enlarge several inches. The shirt was forced away from the extremely bloated stomach. There were purple stretch marks along the edges. Hinata knew that it would be a few days before all the consumed food moved to other parts of the boys body but she could wait. It was fascinating to look at the rather large mound of a stomach Naruto was sporting to the rest of his much thinner body. She would leave the blonde alone for a couple days after this. After all it was only the beginning of her plans...
121121.title: The next day . . .

1211211.content:
There was a reason that Hinata had started with her plan now of all times. Every five years there is a series of festival celebrations in the fire capital. It had taken several strings being pulled with her airess name to make sure that she and Naruto were sent on a mission alone during the same period. It was a simple mission really. Deliver an important scroll of information to the capital and wait for the fire lord to reply, which ALWAYS took several weeks, before returning to Konoha. She even paid the extra money for a nice leaisurely boat ride back down the river so that the most her dear, hopefully extremely fat, Naruto wouldn't have to walk more than a mile or so back to the village. You see, these series of festivals that lasted two full weeks, was famous for its eating contests and food tasting competitions. It had caught her eye a few years ago and the idea stuck with her ever sense.

Normally a single individual was anonymously nominated out of a large barrel of names collected over a series of weeks before the festival began, but her father was well acquainted with the manager of the event and with a few words here and there in her visits to the capital she'd managed to sway the man to have Naruto nominated as one of these 'tastetesters' for the full two weeks. That would most certainly give Naruto enormous dinners every night. Next were the eating competitions in the mornings and early afternoons that she knew she could puppy dog plea him into going into to win her whatever silly prizes they gave out. It was perfect.

Hinata hadn't seen Naruto in nearly a week, silently wondering how much the boy had gained from the rigged extra fatty food she'd stored in his home. She'd gone to his home only once in mid afternoon the other day to up the size in his clothes. Today though, today Tsunade had called the two of them into her office, as she expected. The young Hyuuga easily made her way into the tower, nodding at Shizune the Hokages assistent, before preceding in. Naruto was there already, but she could see a slight trail of sweat down the side of her face already from the short run from his apartment. She smiled. Naruto 'looked' the same, meaning the genjutsu was holding up beautifully, before standing to attention as Tsunade coughed. The old, young looking woman merely relayed the same information she already knew and announced that they must depart before twelve that afternoon.

Hinata left to grab the bag she packed and quickly made it to the North gate to wait for Naruto. The blonde barely made it by the twelve-o-clock deadline. He seemed confused by that fact, but pride seemed to be keeping him from saying anything about it because he kept silent. They took off, Hinata carefully slowing herself down to Narutos slightly sluggish pace, and started to converse with him. It was like that the whole 17 hour journey, though they had to take five different stops for Naruto, and when they stopped for lunch Hinata was dissapointed to see that Naruto only ate a little.
______________________________________________

That night after they'd delivered the scroll and decided upon a joint-room hotel Naruto practically fell asleep the moment he touched the bed. His body exasted from the travel. Hinata smiled as she entered Naruto's room and excitedly let the genjutsu drop. She wasn't dissapointed by what she saw at all. The hundred and twenty pound shinobi of two weeks ago was now looking to be pushing one-fifty. She stood there, enjoying the view of Naruto's bulging ass, because the blonde had fallen asleep on his stomach. The teen now had a thick waist and the pants he wore would be tight on him again soon. She idly wondered if she could get him on a scale without him knowing but threw the idea out. She was good enough at gouging a persons size that she felt comfortable that her estimates were correct.
_________________________________________________

Naruto looked at her incredulously. Hinata stared up at him, eyes watery and big. "A... teddy bear?" Naruto asked uncertainly. Naruto looked at the sign. 'Fudge Eating contest' before looking toward the contestents signing up. They were big. "Um... I... I don't think I could beat these people Hinata. Their huge." Naruto said as he blinked. Hinata tilted her head in astonishment. "Your giving up before you even try?" Hinata asked, moving her fingers in front of her in the most vulnerable and miserable way possible. "I guess I could at least try..." Hook. Line. And. Sinker.

Hinata had to admit that Naruto really did try his hardest to win her the silly bear. In fact even though he was the smallest person there, even without the genjutsu, Naruto still made it in third place out of fifteen competitors. Naruto sat at the end of the table, looking as if he was going to throw up, and with his belly unnaturally extented out. "Oh, that's okay Naruto, thanking for trying so hard." Hinata said sincerely, helping the boy to his feet. Naruto really was the sweetest guy out there. They weren't even officially dating and he'd do anything for her.

Quite a few people snickered at the blondes protruding gut, causing Naruto to blush horribly, despite feeling a little guilty she found the look adorable. When Naruto finally realized how big he'd gotten she was sure he would look like this quite a lot. Blushing adorably. They sat down on one of the benches in front of the stage that Hinata knew in a few minutes would be announcing Naruto's name as a tasteter. Naruto leaned back, trying not to think about how much his stomach ached, and looked down at his extended belly. 'Urgh... this will take me a full day of training to work off,' the blonde thought distainfully. He hadn't even won the fricking bear and now Hinata was dissapointed in him.

Naruto watched as the Manager of the Festival walked on stage and pulled out an envelope. "In here are the names of five winners who will recieve the honorable award of being tastesters for the next full two weeks." Naruto heard some murmuring from the people, obviously some kind of change in the usual had been done. Naruto shrugged it wasn't like it concerned him. "The winners must give great consideration to each and every entry. They will represent the opinion for many wanna be restaurant owners and their futures are in your hands." 'No pressure though,' Naruto thought with a laugh. "The winners are Saro Rine, Fuji Hoes, Chidorn Lie, Dan Morn, and Naruto Uzumaki." Naruto leaned forward from his laid back position and stared at the man in horror.

"What?! No, I decline." Naruto said immediately. An arm gripped a hold of his own arm to stop him from going up to the Festival director and telling him. "Naruto you can't do that!" Hinata whispered to him. He stared at her as if she'd gone crazy. "Why not?" Naruto asked. "The position of tastester is considered an extremely honored position for the festival. Your name was entered so to decline after you've won would be like going up to the fire lord and slapping him in the face." Hinata explained to the boy's growing horror. "But I didn't even enter my name!" Naruto told her adamently. Hinata shook her head. " It doesn't matter. And if you tried to explain that to the festival director he would take it as a great offense. As a Konoha shinobi you can't go against this without damaging the relation between Konoha and the capital." Hinata said sternly. Naruto wanted to cry. Why him? How in the world would he lose the weight he was sure to gain with this? Naruto dropped his head in resignation.
_______________________________________________

Three hundred decent bites of cake the first night. Check.

A hot dog eating contest for a stupid elephant the second afternoon. Which he didn't get. Check.

Followed by tasting a hundred and twenty-five different chilli soups. Check.

The third night he took a fork worth from two hundred types of spagetti. Check.

Forth morning: A large cat toy was the prize for outeating everyone in rice balls. Check.

Forth night he tasted seventy six pieces of dango. Check.
Hinata kindly bought him bigger pants when his ripped in public that very night. Check.

Fifth night he took a bite of two hundred and thirty three pies. Check.

Major difficulty getting up the next morning. Check.
Eighty different squashes he had to take a bite of that night. Check.
He noticed that strangely enough he really wasn't gaining that much from the binges of tastesting. Check.

The seventh morning Naruto caught Hinata looking longingly at a fluffy fox plushy. The prize of an ice cream eating contest. Gave up and volunteered to enter this time. Won it. Check.
Cookies that night. He was expected to eat one of eat batch out of fifty differnt kinds. Check. Major vomiting. Check.

Sushi was the eighth night. A bite of a hundred and eighten of them. Check.

Bread the ninth. Cheese the tenth. Noodle the eleventh. Teas the twelth. Curry the thirteeth. Check.

Naruto had a horrendously hard time getting up the next day. All the other tasters were exceptionally large people and had gained very little. While Naruto looked like he was about a hundred and thirty pounds he felt like he was a hell of a lot heavier. Hinata was in an immensely happy mood for some reason. Naruto was just happy to have the damn scroll and that they were leaving first thing tommorow.

Naruto attempted to get up but sighed in an annoyed huff when he just fell back onto his back. Naruto rocked himself, once, twice up-sa-daisy. Naruto made it to his feet unsteadily before reaching for his pants and tugging them on. Naruto frowned and looked down. Last night they'd been so tight he thought they'd kill him, now they seemed a little loose. Weird.
_________________________________________________

Hinata Hyuuga could not be happier than she was that fourteen night. She snuck into Naruto's room and with a squeak of excitement allowed the genjutsu to drop for her eyes alone. Naruto was officially greatly obese at a whopping...

12112112.content:
Everything about Naruto was now huge. His face ws now round with fat, checks swollen and a definite double chin had formed, making it all the cuter in Hinata's opinion. His arms were now padded with fat, all the way down to his hands, which were starting to look like sausages. His legs were now so thick that Naruto would be waddling more than walking, and running was out of the question. His butt was huge, maybe two feet wide, and Hinata loved every inch of it. But the biggest part of Naruto was his belly. It stuck at least two feet in the air and spilled out around Naruto, framing his once thin frame. And to top it all off, was a pair of moobs twice the size of Hinata's fist resting on his belly.

All in all, Naruto was gorgeous in Hinata's eyes. She struggled to resist the urge to just jump on Naruto and shower him with kisses, forcing herself to make do with rubbing his enormous belly, sending in more chakra. Soon, thought Hinata, joyfully immersed both in her task and her plans for the future.

-----

Hinata quietly stepped into Naruto's room, making sure not to wake him as she made sure her genjutsu was firmly in place before she walked over to Naruto's sleeping form.

"Naruto-kun, its time to wake up," she said softly, gently nudging his shoulder.

"Huh, morning already," Naruto said as he rubbed his eye slowly, moving to try and rise out of bed.

Hinata swiftly moved to Naruto's side to help him up. Naruto would have found it difficult to move that much weight before Hinata put her plan into motion. Now that she was so far along, it was a miracle he had began able to get up on his own these few days. Hinata, however, could move him with ease. For as Naruto grew weaker, Hinata had grown stronger, through both the seals and her own training.
With Naruto now on his feet, Hinata walked out of the apartment to wait for him to get ready. Once outside, she activated her byakugan and watched as Naruto slowly got ready, grinning all the while.

-----

“Let’s go,” Naruto said with a grin, happy to be leaving at last. And with that, he took off, eager to get back to the village. Or at least he would have, were he about two hundred pounds lighter. As it stands, he just took off in a light jog. Hinata, followed with a smirk on her face, easily keeping up with Naruto’s slow pace.

And soon, Naruto began to slow down. He could feel himself tiring, but shock it off, thinking he was imagining it and too stubborn to stop. Soon, he began to pant and sweat was already forming on his brow. He was forced to stop, breathing heavily, hands resting on his knees.

“Oh Naruto,” Hinata raced to his side, voice filled with concern. “Oh I was afraid of this, you must be sick. Oh you’re in no condition to go back to the village like this.”

He felt his belly grow tight and the sides of the chair became constrictive even though his body clearly wasn’t anywhere near it yet. It felt like it was though. It felt like he barely fit in it.

That’s when Hinata walked in.

Love? She had been the first person to ever tell him they loved him.

“To go this far though…” Naruto muttered.

“If you weren’t so stubborn I never would have fallen for you.” Hinata said fondly.

She released the genjutsu.

His stomach jiggled against Hinata as she leaned forward each time and shoved more and more into his mouth. The chair beneath him groaned under the effort of holding him up, but she still continued. A batch of brownies was forced passed his lips next. His quickly tightening stomach protesting against it. Each time Hinata rubbed her fingers along his stomach it seemed to create a little bit more room though.

An hour passed of this gorging and then two. Hinata taking her sweet time, seemingly enjoying every minute of it as Naruto’s stomach spilled out further and further. It was like he was seeing the progressing of a pregnant woman’s nine months sped up. With one last mouthful of pudding Naruto moaned loudly as his shirt finally gave way.

The action seemed to send Hinata into a fit of moaning to. Surprised Naruto didn’t resist when soft lips caressed his own.

“I want you to be mine forever.” Hinata murmured.

She seemed renewed in her need to feed him after these words because the food came faster and faster. The tightening of his belly caused his toes to curl. A twelve month baby seemed to hand over his knees inside his stomach.

“Wha… how are… you doing this?” Naruto muttered through forced mouthfuls. “This.. shouldn’t… be possible.”

“I’m forcing your stomach to expand and heal rapidly.” Hinata muttered, busily forcing down pie bite after pie bite.

The chair strained and groaned… finally breaking down completely. His hands finally freed Naruto found he couldn’t even lift them to push her off. The large mound of flesh wobbled dangerously stretched. Breathing heavily Naruto moaned. It was too much.

Naruto, on the other hand, simply charged in head first throwing the first punch with all the speed he could muster. Normally, this would grant at least marginal success. But then, Naruto was normally almost 200 pounds lighter. As it stood, Naruto half ran, half stumbled towards Hinata before throwing a sluggish punch.

Hinata moved with the fluidity of water, easily slidding around Naruto's sloppy excuse for a punch as her hands shoot forward like lightning, deliverling a single tap that caused Naruto's arm to go limp. But Hinata wasn't done yet, darting to the side and delivering yet another strike, this time to Naruto's other arm, causing it to go limp before Naruto even had the chance to use it. As Naruto continued to stumble forward, from his initally momentum and the shock, it was all he could do to begin turning to face Hinata. And he did so just in time to see Hinata make the move that ended the battle, her hands darting forward and delivering the same taps to each of his legs. This vaused him to fall heavily on his back, having lost what little support his legs were able to provide.

Hinata had to fight the urge to grin as she witnessed the fruits of her labor. Naruto, in his now weaked state, was all but helpless in a fight, and thus in no condition to further persue the dangerous life of a ninja. Hinata, on the other hand, seemed to have gained all the strength that Naruto had lost and more. What Naruto had just experienced was her absolute bare minimum of Hinata's new found power. If she had wanted to, she could have easily moved over ten times faster and delivered blows that would haver paralysed him instantly and thrown him to the other side of the clearing, despite his added weight.

In summation, Hinata was now one of the strongest people in Konoha, where Naruto was now one of the weakest. His new weight would have left him nearly crippled in his former condition, now with his muscles severely weakened and his chakra being constantly drained and disrupted, losing that weight was now all but impossible.

However, Hinata knew better than anyone the strength of Naruto’s determination. He could still move, as slow and unsteady as it was. And with Naruto’s determination, that might be all that he needs to lose the weight and build the muscle again. And if that happened, Hinata would never get another chance to try again. This was the point of no return, and all Hinata had to do was push Naruto over the edge, into a lifetime of immense obesity and dependence on her.

Hinata fought down the joy that rose in her at the thought, allowing only concern to show on her face as she ran to Naruto’s side.

“Oh Naruto-kun, are you okay, I’m so sorry, I never meant to hurt you,” Hinata cried, concern and fear filling her voice.

“It’s alright, Hinata,” Naruto said from his position on the ground, staring up at Hinata. “Apparently you were right, I must need more rest. It was my fault for not listening to you. You think you could release the pressure points on my arms and legs now?”

“Yeah, but what are we going to do in the mean time?” Naruto questioned, not liking the idea of just lying there with nothing to do.

“Well, if you want to be able to train once you can move, then you need to eat,” Hinata said as she unsealed an enormous picnic basket, stuffed to the brim just for this occasion.

Seeing the food, Naruto began to get nervous. “I don’t know Hinata; I’m not even that hungry right now.”

“But Naruto, how can you expect to get your strength back if you don’t eat?” Hinata questioned softly.

“Well,” Naruto trailed off as Hinata’s words made sense to him, but he still wasn’t certain that more food would help him get better. “Wait, how am I supposed to eat right now, I can’t even feel my arms, much less use them.

“Oh, don’t worry Naruto, I’d be happy to feed you,” a grin crept on to her face as she blushed at the thought.

“What?!” Naruto cried in confusion.

“Oh, it’s the least I can do for you Naruto,” Hinata said, smiling sweetly. “You’ve always been so kind to me and always gone out of your way to help me. Please let me help you this time.”

1351.content:
“Sorry Sakura!” shouted Naruto’s voice as an orange and black dash whizzed by the pink haired kunochi. Sakura, who had been out on her way to visit the hokage, was immediately pushed out of the way by the blur and into the local river.

“Narrruuuttttoooo!” she shrieked as she made her way out of the river.

“Woah! Outta the way!” the golden haired ninja yelled this time as he was trampling through the Yamanaka family garden of rare and delicate flowers. Ino Yamanka who had coincidentally been out in the garden at the same time barely caught sight of Naruto as he chased after an equally fast cat.

“Naruto! Watch where you’re going!” cried the platinum blond but it was too late. She watched as his foot came down right on one of the few of her family’s rare and exotic plants. “No! You’re going to pay for that Naruto!” she yelled at the ninja who was too focused on capturing the cat to notice anyone or anything that got in his way.

Later at the Hyuga mansion Tenten and Hinata had just finished a thorough training session. “Nice job Tenten!” complimented Hinata to her squad-mate.

“You too Hinata!” said Tenten equally out of breath from the rigorous exercise. Suddenly a cat shaped figure tore across the Hyuga courtyard and quickly disappeared towards the Hyuga mansion.

“Coming through!” yelled a mob of shadow clone Naruto’s headed towards the two. Most of them whizzed between the two, but unfortunately some of the clones bounded into the two training ninjas rather than go around them. One ninja clone knocked down, Tenten and shredded several of her near infinite amounts of scrolls under foot, another few stomping into a mud puddle near the byakugan using ninja, splattering a stain of mud across her delicate outfit.

“ M.m..my robes” said Hinata almost sobbing as she realized what the flash mob of Naruto’s had done.

“My scrolls!” cried an angry Tenten getting up from the dirt and dusting herself off. One thing was clear to both of them Naruto was becoming a bigger troublemaker than usual.

Later that day the group of girls gathered outside of the hokage’s room to gripe.

Ino’s voice began ringing shrilly. “Sakura can’t you keep your knucklehead squad mate under control?!”

“How exactly am I supposed to keep him under control? He’s a jinchurichi i I can’t contain that kind of power! Sakura asked the group of girls who were advancing towards her.

“Tch, well can’t you just put a muzzle on him or something?” said Ino getting progressively angrier and crossing her arms.

“Yeah! Maybe I could time him down with a couple of ball and chain weights to slow him down! Tenten joked.

“Wait a seconded Tenten, a weight…Weight! That’s it!” Sakura exclaimed the look of a brilliant idea shining in her eyes. The group gathered closer eager to hear what Sakura had in mind to put an end to the rambunctious ninja’s rampage. “Look Chouji’s a pretty easy going guy right?” Sakura asked. The group nodded remembering Choji and Shikamaru two of the most relaxed, no, downright laziest, ninjas the girls knew. “Well I’m just saying, what if Naruto had to lug around a little more?” she asked the rest her voice rising.

“I see what you’re saying Sakura. If we fatten Naruto up, it would certainly slow him down” Tenten said. “But how would we make Naruto chubby? People don’ just turn Choji sized overnight, he eats enough for three people.”

“Your right, but what if we all stuffed him at the same time.” Sakura began grinning as she revealed more of her genius plan. “Let’s think about it. Say you and I asked Naruto out on a date at the same time what would he do?”

Ino jumped in answering for Tenten, “That pervert would probably just shadow clone himself and go out with the both of you.”

“So while he’s separated, we’re umm each supposed to feed him. Is that the plan?” said Hinata speaking up quietly, rubbing her fingers together.

“Exactly!” Sakura said, and then called the group together to scheme further.

Here were the steps to their final plan.
1. Sakura will give Naruto a shadow clone haze jutsu beforehand, so each shadow clone would not remember what really happened.
2. Each girl would ask Naruto out for some reason and force him to come. He’ll split into shadow clones and head to each separate “date”.
3. Do whatever it takes, to feed him till he pops.
4. Even if he asks about his weight, play dumb and just ignore it.
5. Success! A tubbier, slower, and all around easier going Naruto.

The next day Naruto was sleeping in. He had worked hard yesterday chasing that stupid cat all across town! Stupid D-rank missions like that were all he had these days! Suddenly a knock came from the door and still in his pajamas, Naruto answered it.

“Shadow clone haze jutsu” whispered Sakura as she gripped the doorknob, transferring her chakra and jutsu into the hand holding the other side of the handle. Not detecting the jutsu now upon him Naruto opened the door wide, and his sleepy face immediately lit up.

“Well hey Sakura!” he said ecstatically “Why you here?”

“Well, I was going to take you of for some ramen…but I see you’re not dressed.” She said bringing her eyes down to his pajamas.

“OH whoops!” he flushed immediately. “J-j-just let me get dressed and we can go!” he said lightheartedly as he quickly made to take off his shirt.

“Hey, never mind” said Sakura “Just meet me at Ichiraku Ramen! Ok?” and with that she left signaling for Hinata to go knock next.

“Ok sure thing!” He yelled down the hall slipping his pants on. “See you then Sakura!”

Just then there was another knock on the door. “Who could it be now?” Naruto thought to himself.

“H-Hinata?!” Naruo said astonished at her arrival as soon as he opened the door.

The ivory skinned Hinata now stood at his door blushing embarrassed, in a soft voice she asked “Umm…Naruto, I was just wondering, if um, you wanted, to…go on a picnic with me...” the last part she said all at once in a hurried breath embarrassed to even say the words.

Naruto stood dumbfounded for a seconded as he realized what he just herd, then instantly he flashed his trademark grin.

“Of course I will!” he said giving her a big smile and a thumbs up. There was no way he could turn sweet Hinata down. Seeing the smile on her face and how happy she looked as she left his doorway assured him that he’d made the right choice. Even if he would have to hold a separate shadow clone for a little while it wouldn’t be that hard to be with both Sakura and Hinata at once, and for one of Hinata’s meals it would be worth it!

Naruto was just about to form a shadow clone when for the third time; there was a knock on his door again!

“Tenten and Ino!?” Naruto shouted. Things were definitely getting weird, but now the two were standing right before him, but unlike the previous two visitors who were happy to see him, a look on anger was on both of their faces.

“Hey mister!” said Ino pointing a finger accusingly. “Where do you get off? Do you know what you did yesterday? You stomped on one of my family’s rarest flowers!” she said jabbing the finger towards him to punctuate the end of every sentence.

Now Tenten joined in pointing an accusing finger at the very confused Naruto too. “You realize you ruined some of my scrolls you knucklehead! We’ve both decided your punishment!”

“Uh, what is it?” Naruto felt guilty, both the girls before him didn’t have proof, but Naruto knew he was responsible. He hadn’t meant to wreck their things; it was just sometimes he got out of control. What choice did he have, they had basically forced him into it, but it’s not like he could lie about what he did.

“Tenten here and I have been arguing over who’s the better cook. You’re going to be our taste tester for the next few weeks, and then after that we might forgive you...” Ino said.

“Uhh that’s it?” Naruto asked, unbelieving that such a menial task was his punishment.

“It’s the least you could do for messing up my family’s garden!” said Ino not needing to fake her anger.

“Yeah and messing up my scrolls too! Just know your punishment starts today! Be at my place within the hour!” Tenten said forcefully towards him, and with that the pair left, leaving one dumbfounded ninja behind them.

Well the best thing to do for the day was play it his way, and make this a challenge/training session of sorts. He obviously could send a shadow clone to Tenten’s as well as one to either Sakura or Hinata. If he could hold two solid and strong shadow clones for the rest of the day, he would definitely get some good training in! Plus if it meant he could spend the whole day with Sakura and Hinata he would be all for it!

So sending two other well-made shadow clone Ninja’s towards two separate locations and going off in a third direction himself, Naruto had seemingly played right into the girls trap.

Who should the story follow first?

One of Naruto’s extra strong clones made their way to the ramen stand. It had been a while since he‘d hung out with Sakura and he was more than a little excited. He’d chosen to use a shadow clone with her because Hinata somehow knew when he used clones and he didn’t want to insult the girl.

“Hey Sakura-chan!” Naruto greeted.

“I came across a black cat and had to deviant my path to get here or Konoha would have been completely destroyed.” Naruto told her seriously, giving one of Kakashi’s many excuses.

They both laughed good naturedly.

“Sure thing Naruto!” The chef called back over his shoulder.

Naruto turned back to Sakura.

“So… what’s the special occation?” Naruto asked Sakura.

Sakura shrugged in response as she finished chewing the noodles in her mouth.

“Actually I’ve been thinking we should get together more often to catch up and stuff. Lady Tsunade says in a short few months I’ll be placed on emergency call to the outer regions of Konoha in order to give one of the medics there pregnancy leave.” Sakura lied fluently. It would give her an excuse to fatten him up more and she could always just say that Tsunade decided she was needed her more on a last minute decision. The female Hokage was apt to doing such things and Naruto wouldn’t question it.

“Say Naruto…” Sakura trailed off.

“Hm?” Naruto questioned through his ramen filled mouth.

“I’m just curious, how much of this ramen can you eat in one sitting? I’ve heard Kakashi say it was ridiculous amount but I’ve forgotten.” Sakura said carefully.

Naruto grinned.

“I can eat 18 bowls in sitting when I’m really hungry.” Naruto stated proudly.

“Hm… oh.” Sakura said boredly.

Naruto frowned and looked at her.

“What’s with that tone?” Naruto asked.

“Oh… it’s nothing. It’s just… not very impressive. I heard Chouji can eat 30 bowls in one sitting and for some reason I thought you could beat him…” Sakura said with a laugh.

Naruto stared at her, affronted.

“Chouji’s three times bigger than me!” Naruto said, throwing his arms out in front of him to indicate the mentioned shinobi’s girth. “There’s not way I could eat more than that fat-so.” Naruto claimed loudly before quickly looking around to make sure the super sensitive male wasn’t around.

“Hmphf… Is THE Naruto Uzumaki actually trying to make up excuses for why he can’t do something? I suppose since Sasuke is a genius he is more likely to become Hokage too then?” Sakura asked innocently.

Naruto’s face grew red.

“Sasuke is never going to be Hokage because I am!” Naruto shouted.

“But you just said that you couldn’t beat someone because they’re naturally better than you? Doesn’t that mean that Sasuke can beat you too?” Sakura asked.

“Being naturally good at something doesn’t mean you automatically win! If your determined and work hard you can beat anyone!” Naruto said passionately.

“Then prove it! Beat Chouji at his ramen record!” Sakura challenged.

“I’ll right I’ll prove it!” Naruto said passionately as he dug into his food with gusto.

Sakura silently smirked to herself and wondered how the other three were doing. If it was anything as good at this then Naruto would be chubby in no time. No longer bothering them with inconsiderate and immature mission disasters.

“Another bowl old man.” Naruto said as he pushed his first to the side.

The chef laughed good naturedly as he placed the next bowl in front of the teen. Naruto dove right in.

It wasn’t until the 15th bowl that Naruto began to slow done the tiniest bit. Sakura watched carefully out of the corner of her eye Naruto’s slightly distended stomach. All the girls, with the exception of Tenten, were medics. They would be able to tell where the limit to this egging on was. Sakura could tell that Naruto could still eat a lot more within the safety range, at least for a Jinchuuriki anyway. Luckily the bunshin Naruto created could handle such added pressure upon the body. If something such as overeating in each body overwhelmed Naruto then the blonde would simply pass out and whatever it was that overwhelmed would accumulate at a safe rate. Their plan was perfect.

“Slowing down after only 15 bowls? Seems to me natural beats determined any day of week.” Sakura said triumphantly.

Naruto finished his fifteenth bowl and took a deep breath, putting his hand on his stomach before looking up with a determined eye.

“Keep ’em coming old man! I’m beating Chouji today!” Naruto yelled out.

Naruto dug in again, though slightly more slowly, the fattening ramen disappearing before Sakura’s eyes.

On the eighteenth bowl Naruto paused for a minute, setting the bowl down, and then fiddled with something around his waist. Naruto pulled off his hidden belt and laid it down on the side. Sakura smiled as she noticed how the blonde’s stomach fell forward a bit. Not much but a bit. Progress.

Naruto returned to eating the ramen, bypassing his own record, and continuing on. Nineteen. Twenty. Twenty-one. Naruto was slowing down again. Each bowl taking nearly ten minutes to eat. Sakura sighed. It was a good start anyways. She could see his pants straining and the bump against his stomach seemed to be very tight. He could only safely eat one more bowl, she guessed.

The chef placed the twenty-second bowl in front of Naruto with a weary eye. Naruto picked his chop sticks back up and dug in. Fifteen minutes later Naruto brought the bowl up to his lips and drank the last drops.
“Damn… I can’t go any further.” Naruto muttered.

Sakura patted Naruto on the back, inadvertently causing the young shinobi to burp.

“I will beat him, I will.” Naruto muttered.

“Then come back tomorrow and try again when your hungry.” Sakura stated smiling. “After all you got really close. I bet if you tried again tomorrow you’d get it!” Sakura said encouragingly.

Naruto nodded slowly, too stuffed to do much else. Sakura’s mind looked at the blonde calculatingly. If she could get him to stay with him the whole day he would probably digest the food enough for her to be able to eat even more. What would take AT LEAST a couple hours of no annoying Naruto time for the food to digest?

“You want to go to the movies Naruto?” Sakura asked casually.

Naruto perked up and looked at her as if she’d grown a second head.

“You…? With me? The movies?” Naruto asked surprised and delighted.

“It’s not that surprising. We’re teammates. Teammates do stuff together all the time.” Sakura said offhandedly.

“Sure, but not our team.” Naruto said pointedly.

Sakura started at that a bit guiltily, but shrugged it off.

“Then let’s go!” Sakura said, gripping Naruto’s arm and pulling.

The blonde lumbered to his feet, swaying a bit and groaning at the obvious discomfort of undigested ramen gave him.

Naruto forgot his belt.

“I’m sorry Sakura-chan. I don’t know why I fell asleep. I didn’t mean too.” Naruto apologized hurriedly, red with embarrassment.

“That’s alright. I have an idea of how you can make up for falling asleep when we were spending time together.” Sakura said sweetly.

Naruto gulped.

“How?”

“You can treat me to Ice cream, especially since I paid for ramen this afternoon.” Sakura said lightly.

Naruto’s stomach growled and for the first time the blonde noticed it was getting dark.

“That movie must have been really long.” Naruto muttered. “So… Ice cream it is then.”

Sakura smiled as she lead the way to her favorite ice cream place.

When they sat down Sakura briefly looked at the menu, an idea forming in her mind. She caught Naruto’s attention by putting the menu down directly in the middle of the table and pouting her lips slightly.

“Na-ru-to… there’s something here I’ve always wanted to try, but I can’t finish by myself… will you help me eat it?” Sakura asked with her best puppy dog eyes.

Naruto never stood a chance.

“Uh… sure Sakura-chan!” Naruto cried out.

The waiter arrived at their table.

“Can we please have the double fudge rocky mountain special?” Sakura asked sweetly.

The waiter blinked. Then blinked again. He looked between the pair with an unsure measure before shrugging and writing it down. Naruto raised a brawl but didn’t otherwise comment.

His jaw dropped when IT was brought out. A large bowl, roughly the size of a mixing bowl, was set before them. Fudge ice cream filled the entire thing in scoops with chocolate and caramel heavily drizzled on top. Nuts of all kinds covered it from head to the bowls bottom.

“This is… a bit much isn’t it?” Naruto asked nervously, eyeing the offending bowl.

Sakura laughed gleefully.

“I’ve always wanted to try it and it’s been my dream to eat it with someone who could help me finish it so that I could have my picture up at the front of the store.” Sakura admitted/lied through her teeth.

Naruto gulped.

“I don’t think…” Naruto began, but stopped as Sakura showed him big puppy dog eyes.

“Well… I can try.” Naruto said uncertainly.

“I’ll right, let’s dig in then.” Sakura said cheerfully.

Predictably Sakura stopped at only a bowl, but ate so slowly that it seemed she stopped a lot further along. A large chunk was missing from Naruto’s side of the ice cream. The boy’s paints struggled to restrain the tight belly that sat against it. Sakura smiled at the evident bulge coming from the front of Naruto’s shit now. She licked her spoon and gave a loud, dramatic moan.

“Oh! I ate so much! I’m done. I’m so thankful that your hear to help me Naruto.” Sakura said sweetly as she put the spoon done.

Naruto looked up with apprehension before looking down at nearly half the remaining bowl. Naruto sighed, seeming to give up on something, before reaching down to his pants and unbuttoning them with a grunt. The bulge moved forward a little and Naruto sighed happily.

Moaning a little but with determination Naruto once more dug into the ice cream. Bite after bite Sakura carefully watched for Naruto’s limit. She did not want to hurt her friend even if she wanted to slow him down.

Naruto scooped up a rather large bite and shoved it into his mouth, swallowing. The blonde shifted uncomfortable and Sakura noticed the bulge her friends stomach had become tighten. That was it.

Naruto moved to force himself to take another bite but Sakura gently stopped him.

“I think your done for the night Naruto. It’s alright. We can come back and try again another time… okay?” Sakura said gently.

Naruto frowned. Determination still ringing true in his eyes before nodding slowly in understanding.

Sakura stood up and… Naruto attempted to get up but with a grunt fell back onto his seat. Running chakra through her arms Sakura used her strength to help the overstuffed boy up. They walked all the way to Naruto’s apartment like that, with him and his stone hard, distended stomach moving from side to side. Sakura took the keys from his pocket and unlocked the door. She gently helped him into the bedroom and left.

As the door closed the shadow clone lying in the bed poofed away.

While the other girls may have had various special advantages due to a combination of family techniques and medical knowledge, Tenten had her own secret weapon.

Seals.

Specifically, storage seals.

While not a classical fuinjutsu master (having had neither the training nor the inclination), Tenten had put a great deal of effort into better understanding the capabilities and limitations of storage seals as part of leveraging her superlative accuracy with thrown weapons into an entire combat style. Ordinary storage and release methods are not nearly sufficient when faced with the daunting task of releasing dozens (or even hundreds) of projectiles, and so Tenten was well versed in alternative sealing triggers.

For the purpose of winning their little competition, Tenten had thus prepared a special liquid storage seal designed to imprint on the inside of Naruto's stomach and then slowly release its contents whenever the internal pressure in Naruto's stomach was low enough that adding more fluid wouldn't cause it to burst. This seal was then pre-loaded with as much syrup mixed with pureed ration bars and liquid animal fat as Tenten could get her hands on. All Tenten had to do was get Naruto to swallow the seal and he'd be on a constantly fattening diet for weeks.

"Here, Naruto, let me feed you the first slice." Tenten nonchalantly took off a particularly planned piece with a very special payload. "See how the cake is so soft and moist it feels like it's practically melting in your mouth? I bet you could swallow it without even chewing..."
